channel.title: Webclient n client question pi 317 project///--full screen question?
channel.description: does any one know how to make the webclient on the website add in a full screen view? and the client.jar a full screen view? anyone my client is kind of a older one and i googled it didnt pull anything up on this

item.title: Webclient n client question pi 317 project///--full screen question?
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Like I said, you would need to re-size the Java applet. The Java applet size is determined in the html code that you have to use for a webclient.

Read full topic
item.source: Webclient n client question pi 317 project///--full screen question?

item.title: Webclient n client question pi 317 project///--full screen question?
item.dc:creator: @thomashawkins1991 thomashawkins1991
item.description:
@thomashawkins1991 wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

You’ll have to change the java applet size on the html code to fit the re-sized game screen. It is usually 765x503 for a normal client.

i mean like i can make it big but it wont load it big get what im saying i mean like click button in game to change to full screen

Read full topic
